content:
elliottt commented on issue #4449:

Looks like we are missing run tests for fdemote and completely missing _any_ file tests whatsoever for fvdemote. Care to add some of those along with this PR?

Yep, happy to add tests for these. I was working on getting good test cases for fdemote/fpromote before marking this ready, as I noticed they were a little under tested.
